channel.title: Lively Web - a Javascript distributed Web Wiki
channel.description:
Lively web, said to be inspired by Smalltalk, but implemented in Javascript.
https://lively-web.org/ https://lively-kernel.org/ https://lively-next.org/projects.html https://lively-kernel.org/lively4/lively4-core/start.html?load=https://lively-kernel.org/lively4/lively4-core/README.md
Ren-C should be able to be much better than that. (Just some ideas for the future.)
